articles.title: Supreme Court OKs Tennessee ban on gender-affirming care for minors, big loss for transgender rights - AP News
articles.description: An American Civil Liberties Union lawyer says the Supreme Court decision upholding Tennessee’s ban on gender-affirming care for transgender minors is “a devastating loss for transgender people” and "everyone who cares about the Constitution.” The justices’ 6-…
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) The Supreme Court on Wednesday upheld Tennessees ban on gender-affirming care for transgender minors, a stunning setback to transgender rights.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Anne Burrell, TV chef who coached the 'Worst Cooks in America,' dies at 55 - NPR
articles.description: TV chef Anne Burrell, who coached culinary fumblers through hundreds of episodes of "Worst Cooks in America," has died. Medical examiners are set to determine what caused her death.
articles.content:
NEW YORK TV chef Anne Burrell, who coached culinary fumblers through hundreds of episodes of "Worst Cooks in America," died Tuesday at her New York home. She was 55.
